comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Already picked up at civilwarhorror.blogspot.com/2012/03/civil-war-photo-frida..., which links to a Turrentine family website at turrentinenews.tripod.com/id15.html, indicating that he survived and lived until 1905. childsfamily.com/reunion/PS01/PS01_070.HTM would seem to be the same guy. And genforum.genealogy.com/turentine/messages/5.html has fuller family tree information.
